name: Bubble Master: Journey
description:
Bubble Master: Journey is an addictive, exciting, brain-training puzzle game with hundreds of fun levels packed with awesome challenges, power-ups, and effects. Play for free today and join the bubble popping journey!

Follow the bunny Roger to set foot on the wonderful journey of collecting keys, you will encounter lots of different characteristics of bubbles, and the mysterious BOSS!

Try it out today!

COOL FEATURES:
✔ Tons of levels of serious bubble shooting fun!
✔ Breathtaking visual effects
✔ Many exciting new bubbles and power ups
✔ Realistic game physics
✔ Beautiful and harmonious music
✔ Three star ranking system
✔ Accurate controls, with two ways to shoot
✔ Excellent replay value
✔ and much much more...

This amazing shooter game will test your strategy and planning skills in hundreds of exciting puzzles and brain-teasers.

Download now and play for hours!

How to Play
✔ Drag your finger to move the laser aiming and lift it to shoot bubbles
✔ Match at least 3 bubbles of the same color or more to pop the group
✔ Swap and match balls
✔ Boost your experience with awesome power-ups
✔ Master all the different challenges

Liked the game?
WE WOULD LOVE TO GET YOUR FEEDBACK! 
Your reviews/ratings are very important to us, and they’ll help us bring you free updates with more great features and exciting new games! 

Have any questions for us? Contact our support team at
